reviewText:
Lots of good information in this video, at times a little fast and unexplained but it could be figured out with a little prior knowledge of the program. I really like the content.
It would be a highly recommended product, but the video quality is low which won't go unnoticed (you can make things out though) and is kind of frustrating having to look at a fuzzy video for a while.
I don't know if theres a better tutorial video out there, so I would say take the risk with this one and work with it!

If your looking to learn Adobe Illustrator to the highest level, this is the video for you!  A soccer shoe is used for this tutorial, but the techniques shown can be used on any type of product.  This DVD is a great resource if your studying Industrial design or looking to become a designer in any field.

You will notice a difference in your illustrator skills right away.  You can also learn more by visiting their website "render demo [dot] com"
